filmography.title: The Saga of Gösta Berling
filmography.role_description: A noblewoman who falls in love with a defrocked priest in this Swedish silent masterpiece that launched Garbo's career.
filmography.plot: A defrocked priest is hired as a tutor for a count's stepson, leading to a complex web of romance and redemption.

filmography.title: The Joyless Street
filmography.role_description: A daughter of a poor middle-class family in post-WWI Vienna who struggles to maintain her dignity amidst economic collapse.
filmography.plot: In hyperinflation-stricken Vienna, two women from different social classes face moral compromises to survive.

filmography.title: Torrent
filmography.role_description: A Spanish peasant girl who becomes a famous opera singer but is forever separated from her true love by his domineering mother.
filmography.plot: A young woman rises to fame as a prima donna while the aristocrat she loves enters a loveless marriage arranged by his mother.

filmography.title: The Temptress
filmography.role_description: A dangerously beautiful woman who inadvertently destroys the lives of the men who fall in love with her, from Paris to Argentina.
filmography.plot: An unhappy wife ruins her husband financially and follows an engineer to South America, where her presence causes chaos and tragedy.

filmography.title: Flesh and the Devil
filmography.role_description: A manipulative countess who comes between two lifelong friends, sparking a duel and a tragic conclusion.
filmography.plot: Two childhood best friends are torn apart when they both fall for the same seductive and deceitful woman.

filmography.title: Love
filmography.role_description: A married Russian aristocrat who enters into a scandalous affair with a dashing military officer, risking her social standing.
filmography.plot: A modern (for 1927) adaptation of Tolstoy's Anna Karenina, focusing on the tragic romance between a married woman and Count Vronsky.

filmography.title: The Divine Woman
filmography.role_description: A poor French country girl who rises to become a famous stage actress, torn between a soldier and a producer. (Note: Film is largely lost).
filmography.plot: A fictionalized biography of Sarah Bernhardt, following a woman's rise from poverty to the Paris stage and her conflicted love life.

filmography.title: The Mysterious Lady
filmography.role_description: A seductive Russian spy who falls in love with the Austrian officer she is assigned to betray during World War I.
filmography.plot: A Russian spy steals secret documents from her Austrian lover, only to later risk everything to save him from court-martial.

filmography.title: A Woman of Affairs
filmography.role_description: A reckless, thrill-seeking socialite who hides her broken heart behind a facade of wild behavior after being barred from marrying her true love.
filmography.plot: A woman denied the man she loves embarks on a self-destructive lifestyle that threatens to ruin her and everyone around her.

filmography.title: Wild Orchids
filmography.role_description: A neglected wife who is swept into a dangerous flirtation with a Javanese prince while traveling with her older husband.
filmography.plot: While vacationing in Java, a woman is courted by a charming prince, inciting the jealousy and suspicion of her husband.

filmography.title: The Single Standard
filmography.role_description: A wealthy debutante who rejects society's double standards for men and women, engaging in a scandalous affair with a rough sailor.
filmography.plot: A young woman decides to live with the same sexual freedom as men, leading to a romance with a boxer-turned-artist.

filmography.title: The Kiss
filmography.role_description: A woman trapped in a loveless marriage who goes on trial for murder after protecting a young suitor from her jealous husband.
filmography.plot: MGM's last silent film features a wife on trial for murdering her husband, a crime she committed to save another man.

filmography.title: Anna Christie
filmography.role_description: A former prostitute who tries to hide her past when she reunites with her barge-captain father and falls in love with a sailor.
filmography.plot: A woman with a dark past reunites with her estranged father on a coal barge, finding love and facing prejudice.

filmography.title: Romance
filmography.role_description: An Italian opera diva who recounts her tragic love affair with a young, idealistic priest to his grandson decades later.
filmography.plot: An opera star gives up the man she loves because she knows their worlds are too different to ever be happy.

filmography.title: Inspiration
filmography.role_description: An artist's model with a scandalous past who sacrifices her own happiness to save the diplomatic career of the man she loves.
filmography.plot: A Parisian model known for inspiring artists falls for a straight-laced student, but her past threatens their future.

filmography.title: Susan Lenox (Her Fall and Rise)
filmography.role_description: A farm girl fleeing a forced marriage who endures a hard life as a carnival performer and mistress while searching for her lost love.
filmography.plot: A young woman runs away from her father's farm to avoid an arranged marriage and falls for a construction engineer, only to lose him and sink into a life of sin.

filmography.title: Mata Hari
filmography.role_description: The exotic dancer and infamous WWI German spy who uses her seduction skills to steal secrets but falls for a Russian pilot.
filmography.plot: During World War I, an exotic dancer moonlights as a spy for Germany, engaging in a dangerous game of espionage and romance.

filmography.title: Grand Hotel
filmography.role_description: A fading, melancholic Russian ballerina who finds a brief spark of love with a jewel thief before tragedy strikes.
filmography.plot: A group of very different people staying at a luxurious Berlin hotel deal with their respective dramas over the course of a single day.

filmography.title: As You Desire Me
filmography.role_description: A cabaret singer with amnesia who is claimed by a count as his long-lost wife, leaving the truth of her identity ambiguous.
filmography.plot: A Budapest bar singer is recognized as the long-lost wife of an Italian count, but doubts remain about her true identity.

filmography.title: Queen Christina
filmography.role_description: The 17th-century Swedish monarch who masquerades as a man to explore her kingdom and abdicates the throne for love.
filmography.plot: Queen Christina of Sweden is devoted to her country but weary of the restrictions of royalty, eventually choosing love over her crown.

filmography.title: The Painted Veil
filmography.role_description: A neglected wife who accompanies her doctor husband to a cholera-stricken region of China to regain his respect and her own self-worth.
filmography.plot: A woman marries a bacteriologist she doesn't love and travels with him to China, where she finds redemption during an epidemic.

filmography.title: Anna Karenina
filmography.role_description: The definitive portrayal of Tolstoy's tragic heroine who sacrifices her marriage and child for a doomed affair with Count Vronsky.
filmography.plot: A married aristocrat enters a passionate but destructive affair with a military officer, leading to social ostracization and tragedy.
filmography.awards: NYFCC: Win – Best Actress; Venice Film Festival: Win – Best Foreign Film

filmography.title: Camille
filmography.role_description: A dying courtesan in Paris who finds true love with a young man but sacrifices her happiness for his future.
filmography.plot: A courtesan falls in love with a young promise but leaves him to save his reputation, all while succumbing to tuberculosis.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; NYFCC: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: Conquest
filmography.role_description: A Polish countess who becomes Napoleon's mistress in a bid to save her country, bearing him a son.
filmography.plot: The story of the romance between Napoleon Bonaparte and the Polish Countess Marie Walewska, set against the backdrop of European conquest.

filmography.title: Ninotchka
filmography.role_description: A stern, humorless Soviet envoy sent to Paris who is seduced by capitalism and a charming playboy, famously 'laughing' on screen.
filmography.plot: A stern Russian woman sent to Paris on official business finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

filmography.title: Two-Faced Woman
filmography.role_description: A ski instructor who pretends to be her own glamorous twin sister to win back her straying husband.
filmography.plot: When her husband's interest wanes, a wife invents a sophisticated twin sister to seduce him back.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Acting
